publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6655 Jack McConnell: 1GOAL Campaign—That the Parliament supports the 1GOAL campaign, which aims to encourage world leaders to ensure the provision of education for 72 million children by 2015 and to meet the UN Millennium Development Goal to end poverty; congratulates the pupils and staff of Braidhurst High School in Motherwell for supporting the 1GOAL campaign to kick-start the 2010 World Cup in South Africa; praises other pupils across Scotland who have supported the campaign; applauds the millions of people worldwide who have already signed up, and believes that, after the first football World Cup to be held in Africa is over, backs should not be turned on the continent but instead efforts redoubled to ensure that every child can go to school, in Africa and elsewhere in the world. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, John Park*, Marlyn Glen*, Claire Baker*, Patricia Ferguson*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Hugh Henry*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Christina McKelvie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Butler*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Des McNulty*, Karen Whitefield*, Elaine Smith*, Bob Doris*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Elaine Murray*, Cathy Peattie*, Trish Godman*
